name: Komm Susser Tod
description:
You're rather weak and shes rather strong. You only get one shot to stop Genesis , come sweet death.

Controls

WASD - Move

SpaceBar - Jump

Left Mouse (Hold) - Fireball

Right Mouse (Hold) - Waterball

Fire beats water and water beats fire

Nathaniel Geschwill - Programmer

Jose Estrada - Art

Track: "Be Yourself" by Sinyells
Music Provided By: LZtv Entertainment
